text: Opel Zafira is a car produced by the German carmaker Opel since 1999, and is branded as Vauxhall Zafira in Great Britain. ==Replacement of the Sintra== The Zafira is sometimes said to be the replacement of the Sintra, because it was introduced roughly around the same time it was discontinued. Also, they were both minivans. However, the Zafira was in a different segment, and Opel had not intended this. ==Gallery== Opel Zafira front 20080811.jpg|First Generation (A) Opel Zafira front 20080906.jpg|Second Generation (B) Opel Zafira Tourer 1.4 Turbo ecoFLEX Edition (C) – Frontansicht, 15. title: Opel Zafira
